/usr/bin/c++   -Wall   -O3 -march=native -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/draw_trajectory.dir/draw_trajectory.cpp.o  -o draw_trajectory -Wl,-rpath,/home/stevencui/Software/Sophus/build:/usr/local/lib /home/stevencui/Software/Sophus/build/libSophus.so /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW -lX11 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lOpenNI2 -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff
